body.name: Dove Ultra Care Conditioner Coconut & Hydration for Dry Hair Conditioner with Coconut Oil, Jojoba Oil & Sweet Almond Oil 25.4 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: HYDRATING CONDITIONER: Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Conditioner cleanses, hydrates, and nourishes dry hair to leave it feeling soft and smooth.
OIL BLEND: This conditioner is made with a unique oil blend of coconut, jojoba, and sweet almond for beautifully healthy hair that's nourished from root to tip.
92% NATURAL ORIGIN FORMULA: 92% of this hair care formula is of natural origin, meaning it's unchanged from nature or, after some processing, keeps over 50% of its original structure.
REFRESHING SCENT: This hydrating conditioner is infused with a revitalizing coconut water and fresh lime scent to lift your mood and leave your hair refreshed with every wash.
COCONUT & HYDRATION SYSTEM: Dove Coconut & Hydration is a hydrating shampoo and conditioner system that locks in moisture and nourishes dry hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and beautiful.
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This conditioner for dry hair is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles.
body.description: If you're looking for beautifully scented and soft hair that’s deeply nourished and perfectly smooth, this hydrating conditioner is the perfect addition to your hair care routine. Infused with a refreshing coconut water and sweet lime scent, Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Conditioner cleanses, hydrates, and nourishes dry hair to leave it feeling soft and smooth. Formulated with an oil blend of Coconut, Jojoba, and Sweet Almond, this caring and moisturizing conditioner locks in essential moisture for beautifully healthy hair that’s nourished from root to tip. 92% of our formula, including water, is of natural origin, meaning it's unchanged from nature or, after some processing, keeps over 50% of its original structure. The formula won’t weigh your hair down, and because it’s progressively nourishing, your hair gets better and better, wash after wash. As well as caring for your hair, Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Conditioner smells heavenly too. The refreshing scent of hydrating coconut water and sweet lime lifts your mood as well as leaves your hair refreshed with every wash. How to use: After shampooing, apply Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Conditioner and massage, leave on for 1 minute and rinse. For best results and constantly hydrated hair, use this conditioner daily after using the Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Shampoo. Dove care goes further than hair care with PETA Cruelty-Free certification.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Nourishing Secrets Coconut & Hydration Conditioner nourishes your locks leaving them feeling soft and smooth. Formulated with our Nutritive Serum, this moisturizing conditioner locks in essential moisture for beautifully healthy hair that's nourished from root to tip.

Deep Nourishment The lightweight formula won't weigh hair down. It's progressively nourishing so your hair gets better and better with every wash. The Dove Difference From the beginning, Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Dove Nourishing Secrets Dove Nourishing Secrets Collection is inspired by caring rituals from women around the world. It combines intense nourishment with nature inspired ingredients. Cruelty-Free & 100% Recyclable Bottles Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This cruelty-free conditioner is the perfect addition to your cruelty-free beauty collection - just check out its PETA cruelty-free certified logo. Plus, we are now moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Coconut & Hydration Shampoo, 31 oz Dove Nourishing Secrets Thickening Ritual Shampoo, 31 oz Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner, 31 oz Main Benefit Featuring a fresh coconut water and sweet lime scent, Dove Coconut & Hydration Shampoo locks in moisture for soft, smooth, and beautiful hair. Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to repair the appearance of damaged hair. Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner moisturizes for soft, smooth, and manageable hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent
reviews.reviewText: I really like the coconut scent. My colored-treated hair is soft and manageable, Highly recommend,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product and OUTSTANDING price for such a large amount of product!
reviews.reviewText: The scent is so refreshing! And the price alone for such a large amount of ounces is the best deal yet. I will continue ordering this for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cannot go wrong with dove products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good and makes my hair smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Amazing and Perfect for the Money
reviews.reviewText: Dove always comes through!!This conditioner is unreal for the price. I have fine, thin hair and I love switching up my shampoo/conditioner a couple times per week. I wash my hair a lot in the summer because I work out and I can count on this Shampoo/Conditioner combo to really clean my scalp and clean out any hair products that I have in. It's unbelievable that I get so much product for this price. Thanks, Dove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. Delivered on time. Happy customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, makes hair so soft!
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner - I’ve been buying expensive salon grade shampoo for years & just bought this to avoid going out during pandemic. Really glad I did - love the smell (not overpowering), and makes my hair super soft and easy to comb through, which is no easy feat because my hair is very very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Softens hair, but has odd smell.
reviews.reviewText: Was excited to try this product. Good size bottle, ok pricingSmall amount does the trick! Hair is left soft & manageable.Only complaint is it smells odd. Doesnt have a citrus smell I expected from lime.My daughters and couple co workers all made same comment : "smells like marijuana "
